alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Logan; Perkins; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 2:10PM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Boyd, Rock, Blaine, Logan, Perkins, Lincoln, and Chase Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected. Significant amounts of snow and blowing snow are forecast that will make travel dangerous. Only travel in an emergency. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
